name: Personal Training
overview: Get personalized training sessions with certified trainers that cater to your unique fitness goals and needs.
instructor: John Smith - Certified personal trainer with 10+ years of experience in strength training and conditioning.

name: Zumba Classes
overview: Join our energetic dance workouts with infectious music, making exercise feel like a dance party.
classTimings:
Tuesday and Thursday: 5:30 PM - 7:00 PM
Saturday: 10:00 AM - 11:30 AM
instructor: Maria Rodriguez - Experienced dance instructor passionate about making fitness fun through dance.

name: Cardio Batch
overview: Boost cardiovascular health through high-intensity interval training that increases stamina and endurance.
classTimings: Monday, Wednesday, and Friday: 7:00 AM - 8:00 AM
ageGroup: Designed for adults seeking cardiovascular fitness.
instructor: Michael Johnson  - Experienced fitness coach specializing in cardiovascular workouts.

name: Diet Plan
overview: Receive customized diet plans aligned with your fitness goals to enhance your results.
timings: Flexible schedule based on your availability.
ageGroup: Suitable for adults looking to improve their nutrition.
instructor: Emily Anderson - Certified nutritionist with expertise in designing personalized meal plans.

name: Yoga Classes
overview: Immerse yourself in the art of relaxation, flexibility, and mindfulness through various yoga practices.
classTimings:
Monday and Wednesday: 6:30 PM - 8:00 PM
Saturday: 9:00 AM - 10:30 AM
instructor: Sophia Lee - Experienced yoga instructor guiding students towards inner balance and harmony.
